coreDetails.title: Senior Software Engineer
coreDetails.jobSummary: Join our team to lead the development of our next-generation cloud platform, directly impacting millions of users.

keyObjectives.objective: Improve API latency by 20% in Q3

experience.description: Experience building and maintaining high-traffic, distributed systems.

companyContext.culture: We value collaboration, continuous learning, and a healthy work-life balance.
companyContext.growthOpportunities: This role has a clear path to a Principal Engineer position. We offer a $5,000 annual learning stipend.
